description.value: You combine two different maneuvers together into a single flowing whole. Choose any two of @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Grapple]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Shove]{Shove}, and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Trip]{Trip}. Attempt both of the attacks you chose against the same or different creatures, but don't apply the multiple attack penalty until after resolving both attacks.
